products.title: Nera Citrine Vertical Blind
products.description: Using matt and sheen thread to create a two tone geometric shape. Available in other colours. Nera citrine vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Savoy Citrine Vertical Blind
products.description: A blackout fabric with a honeycomb design created using matt and sheen threads, providing privacy and elegance to any living room and bedroom. Available in other colours. Savoy citrine vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Clarke Citrine
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Savoy Citrine (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
